content.rendered:
Nitric Oxide Dump Exercise (4-Minute Workout!)

4-MINUTE WORKOUT

NITRIC OXIDE DUMP

Nitric Oxide Dump Exercise is a new take on high-intensity interval training (HIIT) that includes intense bursts of activity followed by rest periods

Learn More!

Nitric oxide is a molecule that your body produces naturally when it breaks down nitrates and nitrites from the food you eat.

Learn More!

The best sources of nitrates and nitrites are beets and leafy green vegetables

Learn More!

If you use mouthwash, you are actually killing your body’s ability to make nitric oxide!

Learn More!

You only need about four minutes of specific exercise three times a day to enjoy health benefits in your cardiovascular, nervous and immune systems.

Learn More!

Dr. Zach Bush, MD, the guy behind the nitric oxide dump philosophy, developed the exercise program.

Learn More!

Swipe up to learn more and to see the 4-minute workout in action!

Swipe Up!

excerpt.rendered: Nitric Oxide Dump Exercise: Amazing Health Benefits in just 4-minutes! Learn about nitric oxide and how it effects our health plus see the 4-minute workout created by Dr Zach Bush
